title: Jon, ask for Jon as your server.
text: Jon, ask for Jon as your server. He is amazing. Took our table when no one else would, and got us fed STAT!

title: Long flight. Upgrade to Delta One
text: Long flight, you need to sleep. The seats are normal airline seats. Opt for the bed in Delta One. Food was awesome and service was above average for sure.

title: Perfect way to get around Athens with no wait for the taxi after you get your bags.
text: I will use this service everywhere it is available from now on. Perfect experience. Timely, affordable and expedient.

title: Take the time to learn about this incredible edifice.
text: Learning about something as magnificent as the Acropolis will broaden your understanding of the world around you. Absolutely worth the $ 10 Euros. 10. That’s all. Less than your monthly Netflix subscription. Do it.

title: Perfection at a reasonable price!
text: After searching TripAdvisor for the best cruise at the best price with the best reviews we landed on this absolutely perfect experience. Our hotel recommended many other, much more expensive excursions. We ignored them and took this one instead. It is a great crew on a great boat with great food and music. Exactly what it’s supposed to be. And very affordable. Probably the only thing affordable to do on Santorini! Take the time to do business with these people. You deserve it and so do they.

title: Pay the money , it’s worth it.
text: This find is a little jewel on Santorini. The view is insane! The staff and kitchen crew take care of you like family. The food is Phenomenal! The location is about perfectly situated in the middle of the island for easy transit north or south. Use the office personnel for setting up transfers! The bus system is mentioned in other reviews as a cheap and easy option. Do not put anyone you know on this bus unless you are the beneficiary on their life insurance policy. It is a mass casualty event waiting to happen. The cliffs are steep and these bus drivers act like they have nothing to live for. Do Not Take The BUS!! Ask for a transfer, it’s so easy and it’s very very reasonable. Your life is worth the $25 euros. Skip the Donkey ride torture. It’s torture for your back and theirs. Book it! JFDI. You won’t regret it. Trip of a lifetime, destination of a lifetime and hotel experience of a lifetime.

title: Love this place
text: We had the great pleasure of enjoying a meal here in mid March. Both my wife and I got steaks of course. They are always perfect and perfectly seasoned. Aubrey took care of us and this sweet lady is perfection. We will certainly ask for Aubrey next time. Jamey.

title: Perfect for a home base when stopping in Savannah
text: The breakfast alone is worth staying at this hotel. Great service and excellent facilities. Location is perfect, probably easier found in the day than at midnight. Close to the river and easy walking distance to other local destinations.

title: Save your money
text: So, this place is a well designed and beautifully appointed Japanese grill on the parkway in Pigeon Forge. I was Thrilled to see it was open and we pulled right it. We have a place in The Forge and visit often. We walked in, checked out the incredible menu and ordered. There were 2 couples in the place and exactly 2 employees. None of which were Asian. Someone dropped some serious money on building this place, and there is a white guy ( I am white ) on the grill and a brown guy at the counter. There is not a soul of Asian descent in the building. And you could tell when the food came , eventually. The meal was edible and we did not get sick, much to my surprise, and did not have any other issues the next day either. But, someone put some serious money into building this place out, and it is going to go out of business before they ever make a penny unless they make themselves present and participate in running this place.

title: Awesome and worth the stop
text: We usually drive right past this place on the way to Goats on The Roof. GOTR was closed so we turned around and stopped in. Wow, worth the time and money. A really well done set up and a great ride.

title: Underwhelming
text: I have stopped into this Pancake house in the past and would have given it a good review previously. Idk what happened. Food is cheap, safe to eat but INCREDIBLY over priced. Keep driving unless you are diabetic and need some orange juice. The orange juice was Ok.

title: The only place for dessert in down town GVL
text: Excellent flavors, excellent selection and great service. Make a stop, it's well worth your time and money.
place: Luna Rosa Gelato Cafe and Restaurant

title: Best cruise based excursion
text: We had an incredible time on this crab catching adventure. Presley, our guide, introduced our 11 year old to the joy of crabbing. After which we ate more crab than I have ever seen. Great group of people running a very fine crabbing adventure .

title: Great burger and better shakes
text: Absolute must if you are in downtown Greenville for a quick meal. The burgers and huge and delicious. But the shakes are better!

title: Best value on the parkway
text: Wow, what a pleasant surprise on the strip this year. A new go cart, bumper boat, arcade near light 3. Found a buy 2 get 1 free coupon go cart special. Took 5 kids. Great new carts and 3 story track. Affordable fun, don't tell management.

title: So much better than Disney , it not even funny
text: For those of you who have traveled to Disney's water parks , you will be pleasantly surprised by the quality and affordability of Splash Country. We got a retreat, for 150$ on this visit. This same retreat would cost you 350$ plus at Disney. The retreat needs to be booked in advance. DO IT, made a great day even better. We cannot wait till next year.
place: Dollywood's Splash Country Water Adventure Park

title: Second visit to the ol deer farm
text: We have visited Deer Farm in the past for both the horse back riding and the petting zoo. Well worth your time and money. Beautiful trails in the country, far from the main drag and all the noise. Peaceful and relaxing.
place: Smoky Mountain Deer Farm & Exotic Petting Zoo

title: A gem in the middle of chaos
text: We have stayed at river stone 5 times. We did not stay this past visit because I waited too long to book it. Sometimes I am stupid like that. We instead went to the DreamMore Resort. Don't do this. Stay at riverstone. End of story. you actually have room to walk around in your condo. Not like the shoebox you will find at DreamMore. Just sayin, for the money , you cannot beat Riverstone.

title: Excellent
text: Penny was our server and she was excellent. Fast , good food for a great price. Seems like a place you might eat at back home, where ever that is.

title: Needs help, really they actually need more help
text: Extremely well done resort. Great choice in building materials and over all the feel is that of luxury. Staff was nice and as helpful as possible. The main problem, hands down, is the abundance of managers and the like. While there is a huge lack of the people who actually do things , like cooks, servers and valet. This resort desperately needs someone who managed a resort in the past, to come in and help this great destination get on its feet. It feels like the potential is there, but right now it is not living up to it in any way.

title: Absolute must in pigeon forge.
text: Just excellent southern cuisine , made quickly. Good prices. Great service. In the heart of pigeon forge. A must see destination.
